meta.article_title: June 6, 2016 - What to Focus on to Improve

debutant.solution: Develop fundamentals until you can do them in your sleep: strokes, footwork, serve, and receive. Work with a coach to develop them, find players to practice with, and drill, drill, drill!

intermediaire.solution: Develop a playing style by honing your shots and figuring out what you win and lose on.
Use your serve and receive game to set up your overall game.

avance.solution: Continue to work on mastering the fundamentals, even at advanced levels.

avance.probleme: Developing All Parts of Your Game
avance.solution: Develop all parts of your game so you can master any situation and against any style.

exercices_complementaires.description: Focus on fundamentals until they become second nature.

metriques_progression.solution: The more consistent your fundamentals are, the better you will be.
